text: Renee Kristen "Kristy" Swanson (born December 19, 1969) is an American actress. She is best known for playing the main character in the movie Buffy the Vampire Slayer. She has also starred in the movie Flowers in the Attic as well as many movies and television programs. Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Orange County, California
title: Kristy Swanson
